alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 2:23AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times by tonight. Southwest winds from 15 to 25 mph with gusts from 35 to 45 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. Winds will decrease Wednesday evening. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 5 AM Today to 11 AM Thursday: Buffalo Pass 7 to 11 inches Ganado 4 to 6 inches Shonto 6 to 10 inches Window Rock 4 to 6 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
